WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
I apologize if this has already been posted; I did a cursory search and found nothing. 

When I execute the Add Item command for an HTML Application with TypeScript project type in Visual Studio 2012, the TypeScript file does not appear in the Web category as I would expect. It appears the file type has no category associated with it -- it took me a few minutes to find it in the full Visual C# list.
WorkItem.Summary: Add new TypeScript file should be in the Web category

Comments.Message: Marking active, which means we'll be taking a look at fixing this.
Assigning to Jonathan to track project system work
